definition: grouper (Portuguese: garoupa)/also called 鮨/Epinephelinae (subfamily of Serranidae, fish family including grouper)
dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: And always grouper and snapper," he added.
sentences.chinese: 另外還有始終供應的石斑魚與紅鰭笛鯛魚。

sentences.english: I can not sleep in bed, imagine the sea grouper and barracuda.
sentences.chinese: 我在牀上無法入眠，幻想着海中的石斑魚和梭魚。

sentences.english: The grouper is allowing the small cleaner wrasse into its mouth to clean off parasites.
sentences.chinese: 石斑魚允許小瀨魚進入口中清除寄生蟲。

sentences.english: The results suggested that the optimum salinities for the growth of grouper were 15~20.
sentences.chinese: 實驗證明，點帶石斑魚的最適生長鹽度爲15～20。

sentences.english: There is also some difference in the amino acid composition between wild and cultured groupers.
sentences.chinese: 天然的與養殖的石斑魚氨基酸組成也有一定差異。

sentences.english: The salt-water fish we usually eat are Grouper, Golden thread and Pomfret.
sentences.chinese: 我們經常喫的鹹水魚有石斑魚，紅衫魚和倉魚。

sentences.english: If the grouper ate the wrasse , it wouldn't get cleaned.
sentences.chinese: 如果石斑魚喫掉瀨魚，它的牙齒將得不到清理。

sentences.english: Gags are the most common grouper caught on the east coast.
sentences.chinese: 堵嘴是最共同的石斑魚風行東海岸。

sentences.english: They had fished for wrasse, grouper and mackerel.
sentences.chinese: 他們捕撈過瀨魚，石斑魚，馬鮫魚。

sentences.english: Bass swimming around the soft corals on artificial reef.
sentences.chinese: 青石斑魚出沒在澎湖魚礁上的軟珊瑚中。

sentences.english: The vermilion rockfish has scales on the bottom of the lower jaw which make it rough to the touch.
sentences.chinese: 朱石斑魚有底部的較低的下巴，使其按粗糙的尺度。

sentences.english: Far from being the grouper's lunch the wrasse is actually acting as an underwater toothbrush.
sentences.chinese: 瀨魚並未成爲石斑魚的午餐，反而卻爲它水下潔牙。

sentences.english: I was sweat-soaked and sucking air like a beached grouper .
sentences.chinese: 我汗流浹背，象一條擱淺的石斑魚一樣吸着空氣。

definition: fish maw/a food dish made from the swim bladder of fish
long thread moss (Nostoc flagelliforme), an edible algae/also called faat choy or hair moss
rice in gravy, typically with meat and vegetables
